attributes.comment:
I do NOT support this bill at all. By more than doubling the total immigration
fees, you are creating an environment, a United States, that exists solely for
those immigrants who have deep pockets. You are also creating an environment
that increases the separation of family immigrants, for although people might be
able to support themselves once IN the United States, many people are coming
from countries in which they are unable to gain enough money to pay these
increased fees. In fact, many people have been saving money just to pay the
already substantial $400 immigration fees. By more than doubling the immigration
fees, you are delaying their possible immigration, and you are causing families
to break apart. Where once four members of a family could immigrate together,
due to increased fees only two can... if they can find an additional $150
dollars. Although I support increased fees as overhead costs have increased, I
do not support more than doubling the total immigration fees, but instead a less
drastic increase... possibly $500 for the total immigration fees.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Rocio G. Reynoso
